page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICOLA
page.content: It's 06.45 when I get up. I don't get up by myself, my brother always pulls my hair. My mum gets my porridge ready. Then I watch Popeye on T.V. At 07.30 I get dressed, get my things ready for school, then read a book until 08.20. By this time my mum has gone to work.I set off for school and I meet Lucy. When we are in the classroom we read and our class teacher Mr. Margretts calls the register. We then go into assembly. Mr. Bullock our headmaster reads a story then we sing a hymn and say a prayer. When we get back into our classrooms we have English. At 10.35 we have break. After break we have maths. At 12.00 we have lunch break. We have our lunch at 12.20. When I have finished my lunch I go back out to play with Lucy and we play on the field.At 13.00 we have to go inside.
